Attribute.name: platformShortName
Attribute.condition: sat='%%%';SAT=${sat^^}; st="SENTINEL"; s=${SAT##$st}; s2=$(echo $s | tr -d ' -'); val="$st"-"$s2"; up=${val:0:10};echo ${up^^}

Attribute.name: platformSerialIdentifier
Attribute.condition: sat='%%%'; val=$(echo $sat | rev); s=${val:0:1}; if [[ ! "$s"=~[A-Z] ]]; then s="_"; fi; echo $s

Attribute.name: platformSerialIdentifier
Attribute.condition: sat='%%%'; val=${sat:10:1}; if [ -z "$val" ]; then val="_"; fi; echo $val
